c74object.name: jeyrand
c74object.digest: Redistributes numbers as specified by a user-defined Probability-Distribution-Function (PDF) list
c74object.description: A list of probabilities prescribes the PDF along the sample space 0-1. The probabilities included in a PDF-list can be interpolated.

inlet.digest: (0 ≤ FLOAT. ≤ 1) a number to be redistributed (2 ≤ FLOAT. ≤ 32767) to output a list of redistributed-PRNs
(LIST of numbers) PDF list (MESSAGEs) various arguments

objarg.name: not-to-set-mode
objarg.digest: enables all three three possible modes at once
objarg.description:
All the three PDF-list-interpolation components of the object are available when the first argument is a number or there's no argument.
— 1st: 'spread' factor of sine^2 component [float./int.]
— 2nd: 'ratio' factor of sine^2 component [float./int.]
— 3rd: 'spread' factor of arcsec component [float./int.]
— 4th: 'ratio' factor of arcsec component [float./int.]
— 5th: 'spread' factor of gauss component [float./int.]
— 6th: 'ratio' factor of gauss component [float./int.]
— 7th: 'shape' factor of gauss component [float./int.]
— 8th: 'int/ext' factor of the object [float./int.]

objarg.name: setting-mode
objarg.digest: sets the mode of the object
objarg.description:
Sets the object to use only a specific PDF-list-interpolation component.
<To set the object to sine^2 mode>
— 1st (required): 'sine^2' (mode specifier)
— 2nd: 'spread' factor of sine^2 component [float./int.]
— 3rd: 'int/ext' factor of the object [float./int.]
<To set the object to arcsec mode>
— 1st (required): 'arcsec' (mode specifier)
— 2nd: 'spread' factor of arcsec component [float./int.]
— 3rd: 'int/ext' factor of the object [float./int.]
<To set the object to gauss mode>
— 1st (required): 'gauss' (mode specifier)
— 2nd: 'spread' factor of gauss component [float./int.]
— 3rd: 'shape' factor of gauss component [float./int.]
— 4th: 'int/ext' factor of the object [float./int.]

attribute.name: err_msg
attribute.description: [default:0] Any value greater than 0 turns on the attribute.

attribute.name: proc_time
attribute.digest: notify time required for processing PDF-list
attribute.description:
[default: 0] Any value greater than 0 turns on the attribute.
NB) On Windows, the measurement tends to result only in an integer such as 0 MS or 1 MS. This is because the rate of the clock-ticks used in the "Microsoft C Runtime Library" is not enough high.

attribute.name: ignore_0PDF
attribute.description: [default: 0] Any value greater than 0 turns on the attribute.

method.name: spread
method.description: [default: 1] [only available when the object is set to a specific mode] Negative values turn to positives, and the values greater than 1 will be wrapped.

method.name: shape
method.description: [default: 0.5] [only available in the 'gauss' mode] Negative values turn to positives, and the values greater than 1 will be wrapped.

method.name: int/ext
method.digest: ratio between internal sources and external ones
method.description: [default: 1] Negative values turn to positives, and the values greater than 1 will be wrapped.
